response.overview: This is the story of a man who himself is the enemy of humanity, The one who doesn't care about the world, society and public shame due to family relations, He only loves himself and his bad habits and his addiction, Now whosoever gets married to such a person and a girl child is born to him, what will be the fate of his life? What will happen to the house where such a head of the house is there?
response.title: Ek Naradham
